# ChimeraFX for ESPHome

**Repository:** https://github.com/effelle/ChimeraFX

**Description:** WLED effects for ESPHome with clean YAML syntax

## Quick Installation

```yaml
external_components:
  - source: github://effelle/ChimeraFX@main
    components: [cfx_effect]
```

See [README.md](README.md) for full documentation.
